idea-plugin.name: Publish/Verify Tracker
idea-plugin.description:
JetBrains Plugin Publish Tracker

A comprehensive tool for plugin developers to monitor and track the verification and publishing status of their plugins on the JetBrains Marketplace.

Features

  • Real-time Status Tracking: Monitor your plugin's verification status directly from IntelliJ IDEA
  • Phase-by-Phase Timeline: Visualize the entire verification lifecycle with timestamps
  • Analytics Dashboard: View submission trends, average durations, and success rates with interactive charts
  • Smart Notifications: Get instant alerts when your plugin status changes
  • Auto-polling: Configurable automatic status checks (every 1-60 minutes)
  • Multi-plugin Support: Track multiple plugins simultaneously from one dashboard
  • Historical Data: Keep track of all your plugin submissions and their outcomes

How to Use

  1. Open the Publish Tracker tool window (View → Tool Windows → Publish Tracker)
  2. Configure your JetBrains Marketplace API token in Settings → Tools → Publish Tracker Settings
  3. Add your plugin IDs to track
  4. Start monitoring and get real-time updates!

Note: This plugin requires a JetBrains Marketplace API token for authentication. Get yours from JetBrains Marketplace.
